entities.description: The effects of methamphetamine use on important activities during the past 12 months.
Issues related to methamphetamine use, such as missing work, getting demoted, or not being able to keep a job.
Serious problems caused by methamphetamine use at work, school, or home.
Arguments or other problems with family or friends due to methamphetamine use.

relationships.description: Relates substance use disorder to the effects of methamphetamine use on important activities.
Indicates issues associated with methamphetamine use.
Relates methamphetamine use to problems at work, school, or home.
Relates methamphetamine use to issues with family or friends.
